TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void IssuedSecurityTokenHandler(SecurityToken issuedToken, EndpointAddress tokenRequestor);
.class public auto ansi sealed IssuedSecurityTokenHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub IssuedSecurityTokenHandler(issuedToken As SecurityToken, tokenRequestor As EndpointAddress)
public delegate void IssuedSecurityTokenHandler(SecurityToken ^ issuedToken, EndpointAddress ^ tokenRequestor);

span.span: The token to be issued to the client.

param.name: tokenRequestor

span.span: The endpoint for which the token is requested.

param.span: 이는 클라이언트가 발급된 토큰을 표시하는 끝점입니다.

span.span: This is the endpoint to which the client will present the issued token.

summary.span: 이 대리자는 구현 시 토큰이 클라이언트에 발급되기 전에 인증자에 의해 호출되는 메서드를 가리킵니다.

span.span: This delegate points to a method that when implemented will be called by the Authenticators before the token is issued to the client.
